trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBSEA058_00470_SEQ_00<tab>Ostfyr hopes to assure the safety of wayfarers at the La Thagran Checkpoint by ridding the area of its dangerous denizens.
TEXT_SUBSEA058_00470_SEQ_01<tab>You learn that the Rogue River has been particularly perilous of late. Overturn three yarzon nests, and extirpate the yarzons that appear.

TEXT_SUBSEA058_00470_SEQ_02<tab>You have considerably thinned out the yarzon population at the Rogue River. Return to the La Thagran Checkpoint to let Ostfyr know that the creatures will menace wayfarers no more.
TEXT_SUBSEA058_00470_SEQ_03<tab>The Yellowjackets are too few in number to guard the La Thagran Checkpoint, and the surrounding regions have not a man to spare. They need your help.
TEXT_SUBSEA058_00470_TODO_00<tab>Jostle the yarzons out of their nests and slay them.
TEXT_SUBSEA058_00470_OSTFYR_000_1<tab>More and more travelers pass through these gates bloodied and bruised each day.
TEXT_SUBSEA058_00470_OSTFYR_000_2<tab>They tell me the yarzons harry them at the Rogue. It pains me to do nothing, but we need every man we have just to hold the garrison.
TEXT_SUBSEA058_00470_OSTFYR_000_3<tab>You would do us all a great service were you to thin the yarzon population for us. If you could clear out, say, three of their nests, we'd all be in your debt.
TEXT_SUBSEA058_00470_OSTFYR_000_11<tab>Ah, so you did for the vilekin? Every passer-through owes you a debt of gratitude.

TEXT_SUBSEA058_00470_OSTFYR_000_12<tab>La Thagran is a vital stronghold, one the Maelstrom would defend themselves, had they the means. The fleet is spread too thin, which is why the Yellowjackets have been called in.
TEXT_SUBSEA058_00470_OSTFYR_000_13<tab>But our numbers are hardly inexhaustible, and your help goes a long way towards preserving the peace.
TEXT_SUBSEA058_00470_POP_MESSAGE<tab>Angry yarzons burst out from the nest!
